org.cs2c.nginlib.monitor
接口 CPUStatus

public interface CPUStatus

作者：
Mikes

This interface is used to get the remote real-time info of CPU. The instance implementing the interface is related with cpu status of a specific time. The operate is off-line, and the instance state-less.

方法摘要
 int getBlockingNum()
          Get current blocked task number which has already fetched from remote host.
 int getContextSwitchNum()
          Get current CPU context switch count per second, which has already fetched from remote host.
 float getIdlePercent()
          Get current CPU idle percent, which has already fetched from remote host.
 int getInterruptNum()
          Get current CPU interrupt count per second, which has already fetched from remote host.
 float getIOWaitPercent()
          Get current CPU time percent for IO waiting, which has already fetched from remote host.
 int getRunningNum()
          Get current running task number which has already fetched from remote host.
 float getSystemPercent()
          Get current CPU used percent of system, which has already fetched from remote host.
 float getUserPercent()
          Get current CPU used percent of user, which has already fetched from remote host.
 

方法详细信息

getRunningNum

int getRunningNum()
Get current running task number which has already fetched from remote host.

返回：
The current running task number

getBlockingNum

int getBlockingNum()
Get current blocked task number which has already fetched from remote host.

返回：
The current blocked task number

getInterruptNum

int getInterruptNum()
Get current CPU interrupt count per second, which has already fetched from remote host.

返回：
The current CPU interrupt count per second.

getContextSwitchNum

int getContextSwitchNum()
Get current CPU context switch count per second, which has already fetched from remote host.

返回：
The current CPU context switch count per second.

getUserPercent

float getUserPercent()
Get current CPU used percent of user, which has already fetched from remote host.

返回：
The current CPU used percent of user.

getSystemPercent

float getSystemPercent()
Get current CPU used percent of system, which has already fetched from remote host.

返回：
The current CPU used percent of system.

getIdlePercent

float getIdlePercent()
Get current CPU idle percent, which has already fetched from remote host.

返回：
The current CPU idle percent.

getIOWaitPercent

float getIOWaitPercent()
Get current CPU time percent for IO waiting, which has already fetched from remote host.

返回：
The current CPU time percent for IO waiting.
